article_title: Cruz tells crowd he has big plans for the first day as president
article_text:
Presidential candidate Ted Cruz vows to repeal Obamacare, dismantle Common Core and reform tax code with 10 percent flat tax

He also pledged to “rip to shreds the catastrophic Iranian nuclear deal”

Cruz said Sunday that he had the most campaign contributions in the bank among his presidential contenders

article_metadata.news-keywords: Ted Cruz, senator, U.S., Texas, president, presidential, candidate, Republican, Conway, Myrtle Beach, South Carolina, politics, town hall, Horry Georgetown Technical College
article_metadata.description: A crowd of more than 400 spectators – several waving Ted Cruz signs – packed the gymnasium inside Ocean Bay Middle School on Sunday to hear the freshman Republican senator from Texas share his goals for the nation’s highest seat in office.
article_metadata.title: Cruz tells crowd he has big plans for the first day as president | The Sun News
